game.title: VoxeLibre (formerly MineClone2)

long_description:
Adds bronze & copper stuff to Mineclone 2.
Bronze item - 80% durability of iron, but dig_speed_class + 1.
Bronze sword - speed = speed diamond sword, 80% durability of iron.
Bronze armor - protection = chainmail armor +1 , 80% durability of iron.
Copper stuff - 80% durability of bronze.
! tin is not realized, use an iron ingot to obtain bronze.
ALTERNATIVE RECIPES:
(instead of an iron ingot, a bronze one, but the functions of the items are the same).
* Bucket
* Rails
* Shield
RECIPES:
* Broze Armor
* Bronze tools: shovel, sword, pickaxe, axe, shears, hoe...
* Bronze Ingot
* Copper tools: shovel, hoe, shears...
name: mcl_bronze_stuff
short_description: Add Bronze & Copper stuff for VoxeLibre
title: Bronze & Copper stuff for VoxeLibre(ex.Mineclone 2)
